actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for special immigrant status for certain aliens classified or previously classified as 'G-4 nonimmigrants' and for certain members of their immediate families.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit retirees of certain international organizations and their families who have lived in the United States for specified periods of time to remain here upon termination of such employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for special immigrant status for certain aliens classified or previously classified as 'G-4 nonimmigrants' and for certain members of their immediate families.
